column3: The talent we saw was impressive for this rather small venue. You won't be disappointed. Parking is also free and convenient.

column2: Hip small music club in Leimert Park
column3: This tiny club is located in the trendy Leimert Park. The many musicians were fabulous, but they were miked, so the music was so loud in the small space it sounded blurry. A fun experience, but wish they did not use microphones. The concert I went to was cash only.
